unnormalised: Don't forget to check your policy details like sum assured, policy term, & premium payment frequency (e.g., monthly, quarterly) to ensure it aligns with your financial goals, especially before 31/03. Policies like Jeevan Saral (Table No. 165) from LIC offer flexibility.
normalised: Don't forget to check your policy details like sum assured, policy term, and premium payment frequency (for example, monthly, quarterly) to ensure it aligns with your financial goals, especially before thirty first march. Policies like Jeevan Saral (Table Number one hundred and sixty five) from L-I-C offer flexibility.
